supporting_resource.description: The gid of the supporting resource to add to the parent goal. Must be the gid of a goal, project, task, or portfolio.

insert_before.description: An id of a subgoal of this parent goal. The new subgoal will be added before the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified. Currently only supported when adding a subgoal.

insert_after.description: An id of a subgoal of this parent goal. The new subgoal will be added after the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified. Currently only supported when adding a subgoal.

contribution_weight.description: The weight that the supporting resource's progress will contribute to the supported goal's progress. This can be 0, 1, or any value in between.
